courseDescription: Oasis vibes tucked back in the heart of Cave Creek, short course with views
Scottsdale's top confidence builder, shoot low and enjoy a break from desert golf with shade on every hole!
Play golf where the pro's play, fast greens, luscious fairways. Be careful, you might not make it out alive!
No golf carts, no range finders, no waiting. Play in your own booth and enjoy the facility
Tucked in at the base of Camelback mountain, enjoy this short par three course. Perfect for after work tournaments and enjoying time with friends
Come play golf with our local college kids, drink beer and forget your playing on a golf course
